mn46:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn46:2.2: ‘aho vata anittha akanta amanapa dhamma parihayeyyum, ittha kanta manapa dhamma abhivaddheyyun’ti.
mn46:2.3: Tesam, bhikkhave, sattanam evankamanam evamchandanam evamadhippayanam anittha akanta amanapa dhamma abhivaddhanti, ittha kanta manapa dhamma parihayanti.
mn46:2.4: Tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, kam hetum paccetha”ti?
mn46:2.5: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma, bhagavamnettika, bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantanneva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho; bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
mn46:2.6: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn46:2.7: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn46:3.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano, ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito, sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito,
mn46:3.2: sevitabbe dhamme na janati asevitabbe dhamme na janati, bhajitabbe dhamme na janati abhajitabbe dhamme na janati.
mn46:3.3: So sevitabbe dhamme ajananto asevitabbe dhamme ajananto, bhajitabbe dhamme ajananto abhajitabbe dhamme ajananto, asevitabbe dhamme sevati sevitabbe dhamme na sevati, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati.
mn46:3.4: Tassa asevitabbe dhamme sevato sevitabbe dhamme asevato, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajato bhajitabbe dhamme abhajato anittha akanta amanapa dhamma abhivaddhanti, ittha kanta manapa dhamma parihayanti.
mn46:3.6: Evanhetam, bhikkhave, hoti yatha tam aviddasuno.
mn46:4.1: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako, ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito, sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito,
mn46:4.2: sevitabbe dhamme janati asevitabbe dhamme janati, bhajitabbe dhamme janati abhajitabbe dhamme janati.
mn46:4.3: So sevitabbe dhamme jananto asevitabbe dhamme jananto, bhajitabbe dhamme jananto abhajitabbe dhamme jananto, asevitabbe dhamme na sevati sevitabbe dhamme sevati, abhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati.
mn46:4.4: Tassa asevitabbe dhamme asevato sevitabbe dhamme sevato, abhajitabbe dhamme abhajato bhajitabbe dhamme bhajato, anittha akanta amanapa dhamma parihayanti, ittha kanta manapa dhamma abhivaddhanti.
mn46:4.6: Evanhetam, bhikkhave, hoti yatha tam viddasuno.
mn46:5.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkhanceva ayatinca dukkhavipakam;
mn46:5.4: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamadanam paccuppannasukham ayatim dukkhavipakam;
mn46:5.5: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkham ayatim sukhavipakam;
mn46:5.6: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamadanam paccuppannasukhanceva ayatinca sukhavipakam.
mn46:6.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidam dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkhanceva ayatinca dukkhavipakam, tam avidva avijjagato yathabhutam nappajanati:
mn46:6.3: Tam avidva avijjagato yathabhutam appajananto tam sevati, tam na parivajjeti.
mn46:6.4: Tassa tam sevato, tam aparivajjayato, anittha akanta amanapa dhamma abhivaddhanti, ittha kanta manapa dhamma parihayanti.
mn46:6.6: Evanhetam, bhikkhave, hoti yatha tam aviddasuno.

mn46:14.1: Katamanca, bhikkhave, dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkhanceva ayatinca dukkhavipakam?
mn46:14.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena panatipati hoti, panatipatapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.3: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena adinnadayi hoti, adinnadanapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;

mn46:14.5: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena musavadi hoti, musavadapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.6: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena pisunavaco hoti, pisunavacapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.7: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena pharusavaco hoti, pharusavacapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.8: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena samphappalapi hoti, samphappalapapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.9: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena abhijjhalu hoti, abhijjhapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.10: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena byapannacitto hoti, byapadapaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
mn46:14.11: sahapi dukkhena sahapi domanassena micchaditthi hoti, micchaditthipaccaya ca dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
mn46:14.12: So kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
mn46:14.13: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkhanceva ayatinca dukkhavipakam.

mn46:18.2: Atha puriso agaccheyya jivitukamo amaritukamo sukhakamo dukkhappatikulo.
mn46:18.6: Tassa te pivato ceva nacchadessati vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana maranam va nigacchasi maranamattam va dukkhan’ti.
mn46:18.8: Tassa tam pivato ceva nacchadeyya vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana maranam va nigaccheyya maranamattam va dukkham.
mn46:18.9: Tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam dhammasamadanam vadami, yamidam dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkhanceva ayatinca dukkhavipakam.
mn46:19.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, apaniyakamso vannasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
mn46:19.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya jivitukamo amaritukamo sukhakamo dukkhappatikulo.
mn46:19.5: ‘ambho purisa, ayam apaniyakamso vannasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
mn46:19.8: Tassa te pivatohi kho chadessati vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana maranam va nigacchasi maranamattam va dukkhan’ti.
mn46:19.10: Tassa tam pivatohi kho chadeyya vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana maranam va nigaccheyya maranamattam va dukkham.
mn46:19.11: Tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam dhammasamadanam vadami, yamidam dhammasamadanam paccuppannasukham ayatim dukkhavipakam.
mn46:20.4: ‘ambho purisa, idam putimuttam nanabhesajjehi samsattham, sace akankhasi piva.
mn46:20.5: Tassa te pivatohi kho nacchadessati vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana sukhi bhavissasi’ti.
mn46:20.7: Tassa tam pivatohi kho nacchadeyya vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana sukhi assa.
mn46:20.8: Tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam dhammasamadanam vadami, yamidam dhammasamadanam paccuppannadukkham ayatim sukhavipakam.

mn46:21.7: Tassa tam pivato ceva chadeyya vannenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitva ca pana sukhi assa.

mn46:22.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, vassanam pacchime mase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalahake deve adicco nabham abbhussakkamano sabbam akasagatam tamagatam abhivihacca bhasate ca tapate ca virocate ca;
mn46:22.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yamidam dhammasamadanam paccuppannasukhanceva ayatinca sukhavipakam tadanne puthusamanabrahmanaparappavade abhivihacca bhasate ca tapate ca virocate ca”ti.
mn46:22.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
